languages.text: "Напоминаю: Глейто — живое оружие. Если количество пальцев вас устраивает — не трогайте пса".
"I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."
languages.original_text: "Напоминаю: Глейто — живое оружие. Если количество пальцев вас устраивает — не трогайте пса".

traits.locale_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you are satisfied with the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."
"I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you are satisfied with the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."
"I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."
"I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."
"I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."
"I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."

languages.text: 「念のため言っておきますが、グライトは生きた兵器です。指を失いたくなければ、犬に触れない方がいい」
languages.original_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."

traits.locale_text: 「念のため言っておきますが、グライトは生きた兵器です。指を失いたくなければ、犬に触れない方がいい」

languages.text: "Ich muss Euch daran erinnern, dass Glaito eine lebende Waffe ist. Wenn Ihr Eure Finger behalten wollt, solltet Ihr den Hund nicht anfassen."
languages.original_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euch daran erinnern, dass Glaito eine lebende Waffe ist. Wenn Ihr Eure Finger behalten wollt, solltet Ihr den Hund nicht anfassen."

languages.text: « Je préfère vous rappeler que Glaito est une arme vivante. Si vous tenez à vos doigts, je vous déconseille de le toucher. »
languages.original_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère vous rappeler que Glaito est une arme vivante. Si vous tenez à vos doigts, je vous déconseille de le toucher. »

languages.text: «Me veo en la obligación de recordarle que Glaito es un arma viviente. Si le gusta el número de dedos que tiene, haga el favor de no tocar al perro».
languages.original_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."

traits.locale_text: «Me veo en la obligación de recordarle que Glaito es un arma viviente. Si le gusta el número de dedos que tiene, haga el favor de no tocar al perro».

languages.text: “我必须提醒你，格雷托是一件拥有生命的武器。如果你不嫌自己手指太多的话，就不要碰它。”
languages.original_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."

traits.locale_text: “我必须提醒你，格雷托是一件拥有生命的武器。如果你不嫌自己手指太多的话，就不要碰它。”

languages.text: "Glaito'nun canlı bir silah olduğunu hatırlatayım. Parmağınızı kaybetmek istemiyorsanız köpeğe dokunmayın."
languages.original_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'nun canlı bir silah olduğunu hatırlatayım. Parmağınızı kaybetmek istemiyorsanız köpeğe dokunmayın."

languages.original_text: "I must remind you that Glaito is a living weapon. If you like the number of fingers you have, do not touch the dog."
